item.title: Upcoming Secret Lair Our Boss Is On Vacation Superdrop Brings Burst of Variety
item.content:encoded:
https://techraptor.net/tabletop/news/upcoming-secret-lair-our-boss-is-on-vacation-superdrop-brings-burst-of-variety

Wizards of the Coast has announced a Secret Lair superdrop for Magic: The Gathering. The lengthy Secret Lair Our Boss Is On Vacation superdrop will contain nine special drops for fans of the game to pick up, with a special promo card for those that go all in.

The Secret Lair Our Boss Is On Vacation Superdrop Announcement

In the official store page, Wizards of the Coast outlines the cards in the Secret Lair Our Boss Is On Vacation superdrop. As the name implies, the cards in this superdrop are chaotic and sporadic. As if the person in charge wasn't around to approve them.

The first three drops in the superdrop are the previously announced Spongebob Squarepants Secret Lairs. Want to wield Mr. Krabs or Sandy Cheeks as Legendary Creatures or just cast meme-art versions of Counterspell and Force of Despair? These are the cards to pick up.

The fourth drop in the Secret Lair Our Boss Is On Vacation superdrop is all about dragons. The They Grow Up So Fast drop showcases five different dragonlord cards. Each card is reversible. One side shows the dragon as a recently hatched wyrmling. the other shows them fully matured. This drop contains the following cards:

  • Dragonlord Atarka
  • Dragonlord Dromoka
  • Dragonlord Kologhan
  • Dragonlord Ojutai
  • Dragonlord Silumgar

For those with an eye for nature, the fifth drop is for you. The Garden Buds drop showcases nature or forest-dwelling cards in a trippy artstyle courtesy of Jordan Crane. The cards featured in this drop are as follows:

  • Ashaya, Soul of the Wind
  • Elvish Reclaimer
  • Harrow
  • World Shaper
  • Horn of Greed

Drop six is for those that have indulged in a bit of fantasy romance. Aptly named Tragic Romance, this drop contains four cards with artwork straight out of a harlequin romance novel showcasing art by Abigail Larson. Those four cards are:

  • Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon
  • Kaalia of the Vast
  • Angel of Despair
  • Master of Cruelties

In a complete pivot in tone is the seventh drop. The Twisted Toons drop sports an early 20th century cartoon look straight out of Fleisher Studios. If you like old-school Disney, or played a lot of Cuphead, these cards may catch your eye. Those cards are.

  • Silence
  • Winds of Abandon
  • Culling of the Weak
  • Fatal Push
  • Young Wolf

The eighth drop in the Secret Lair Our Boss Is On Vacation superdrop is yet another switch in tone. The Pick 'Em and Stick 'Em drop is a candy coated dose of bright, colorful fluff. It even has sheets of stickers to customize those cards further. The drop contains the following:

  • Thalia, Heretic Cathar
  • Clever Impersonator
  • Hedron Crab
  • Pitiless Plunderer
  • Treasure Token

Last but not least is the Secret Lair: Class of '87 drop. As the name implies, this drop reimagines several cards as high school yearbook photos. The artwork by Stephen Andrade and Scott Okumura even goes that extra mile with era-specific stylized text. The cards in this drop are:

  • Aesi, Tyrant of Gyre Strait
  • Anje Falkenrath
  • Chulane, Teller of Tales
  • Radha, Heart of Keld

All nine drops in the Secret Lair Our Boss Is On Vacation superdrop is available in both non-foil (MSRP $29.99) and foil (MSRP $39.99). In addition, if you spend more than $150 on a single order, you will receive a rainbow foil Deadeye Navigator promo card at no additional charge. The superdrop will be available March 24.

Ever since he was small, Tyler Chancey has had a deep, abiding love for video games and a tendency to think and overanalyze everything he enjoyed. Thisâ€¦ More about Tyler
